headline: Market Hits All-Time High on Tech Speculation
summary: Analysts are stunned as the market, led by the tech sector, reached a new peak. Experts caution that this may be a bubble.

headline: Dummy Corp (DUMMY) Announces 'Revolutionary' New Product
summary: Shares for Dummy Corp surged 15% in pre-market trading after they announced a new product that analysts say 'does nothing, but looks great.'
